events.id: IFF - A World Apart-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - A World Apart
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- After 40 years of teaching in a metropolitan Roman school, Michele starts a new life in a remote village high in the Abruzzi Mountains. He must overcome his urban inadequacy, make friends, and embark on a race against time to save the school he comes to love. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- After 40 years of teaching in a metropolitan Roman school, Michele starts a new life in a remote village high in the Abruzzi Mountains.
He must overcome his urban inadequacy, make friends, and embark on a race against time to save the school he comes to love.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - An Ode to Naples-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - An Ode to Naples
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Trudie Styler reveals and unmasks Napoli through the eyes of Neapolitans. A fascinating and stunning glimpse into an ancient city of culture, chaos, and contrast. ---

Italian and English with subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Trudie Styler reveals and unmasks Napoli through the eyes of Neapolitans.
A fascinating and stunning glimpse into an ancient city of culture, chaos, and contrast.
--- Italian and English with subtitles

events.id: IFF - An Ode to Naples - Special Event-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema

events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Trudie Styler reveals and unmasks Napoli through the eyes of Neapolitans. A fascinating and stunning glimpse into an ancient city of culture, chaos, and contrast. ---

Italian and English with subtitles

European summer is calling - indulge in a Campari while watching this facination documnetary about Naples. Tickets $25.

Arrivals from 12:00pm for a 12:30pm film screening.
events.description:
Details --- Trudie Styler reveals and unmasks Napoli through the eyes of Neapolitans.

events.id: IFF - Ciao Bambino-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Ciao Bambino
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- On the outskirts of Napoli, Attilo’s first job is to protect a young street worker.
The young couple find themselves falling for each other, but the dangerous criminal underworld they live in seems destined to challenge them. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- On the outskirts of Napoli, Attilo’s first job is to protect a young street worker.
The young couple find themselves falling for each other, but the dangerous criminal underworld they live in seems destined to challenge them.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Comandante-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Comandante
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- The true story of Comandante Salvatore Todaro, Captain of an Italian Royal Navy submarine. When Todaro sinks an enemy ship, he reaches a decision that is destined to make history: putting his crew at huge risk he decides to rescue the 26 survivors. ---

Italian, English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- The true story of Comandante Salvatore Todaro, Captain of an Italian Royal Navy submarine.
When Todaro sinks an enemy ship, he reaches a decision that is destined to make history: putting his crew at huge risk he decides to rescue the 26 survivors.
--- Italian, English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Family Matters-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Family Matters
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Six adults, who all share the same father, gather for the first time in their father’s house in Bordeaux for the reading of their father’s will. For a time, they experience the illusion of being a united family, but each brings an entirely different story, identity, and perspective on their father. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Six adults, who all share the same father, gather for the first time in their father’s house in Bordeaux for the reading of their father’s will.
For a time, they experience the illusion of being a united family, but each brings an entirely different story, identity, and perspective on their father.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Gloria!-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Gloria!
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Gloria! tells the story of Teresa, a young woman with a visionary talent who, together with a small group of extraordinary musicians, crosses centuries and challenges the dusty old world of classical music by inventing rebellious, modern music. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Gloria!
tells the story of Teresa, a young woman with a visionary talent who, together with a small group of extraordinary musicians, crosses centuries and challenges the dusty old world of classical music by inventing rebellious, modern music.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Gospel According to Mary-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Gospel According to Mary
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Mary is forbidden knowledge and education as a young woman growing up in Nazareth. She finds an ally and teacher in Joseph's, but they fall in love and risk disrupting God’s plan for the Annunciation. ---

Italian, Sardinian
events.description:
Details --- Mary is forbidden knowledge and education as a young woman growing up in Nazareth.
She finds an ally and teacher in Joseph's, but they fall in love and risk disrupting God’s plan for the Annunciation.
--- Italian, Sardinian

events.id: IFF - Il Boemo-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Il Boemo
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- The extraordinary and unknown story of Josef Myslivecek -"Il Boemo"-one of the most prolific opera composers in 18th century Italy, who was a friend and inspiration to Mozart. He was sought after by the courts of Naples and Venice, while his love life was inextricably entwined with his Musical brilliance. ---

Italian, Czech, French, German
events.description:
Details --- The extraordinary and unknown story of Josef Myslivecek -"Il Boemo"-one of the most prolific opera composers in 18th century Italy, who was a friend and inspiration to Mozart.
He was sought after by the courts of Naples and Venice, while his love life was inextricably entwined with his Musical brilliance.
--- Italian, Czech, French, German

events.id: IFF - Il Postino-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Il Postino
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- When Nobel Prize-winning Chilean poet Pablo Neruda is exiled to the island of Procida, he captures the attention of the local postman, Mario. The power of language and poetry opens Mario’s mind and expands his horizons, and soon, he wishes to use the newly discovered power of words to woo the beautiful Beatrice. ---

Italian, Spanish
events.description:
Details --- When Nobel Prize-winning Chilean poet Pablo Neruda is exiled to the island of Procida, he captures the attention of the local postman, Mario.
The power of language and poetry opens Mario’s mind and expands his horizons, and soon, he wishes to use the newly discovered power of words to woo the beautiful Beatrice.
--- Italian, Spanish

events.id: IFF - In the Mirror-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - In the Mirror
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- When Monica loses her memory, she creates meaning in her life by identifying with the characters from films of the Golden Age of Italian cinema. In an act of love, Edoardo indulges her imagination, allowing it to become their new life. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- When Monica loses her memory, she creates meaning in her life by identifying with the characters from films of the Golden Age of Italian cinema.
In an act of love, Edoardo indulges her imagination, allowing it to become their new life.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - L'immensità-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - L'immensità
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- In one volatile summer in the 1970’s, Andrea and her family move into a stylish new apartment on the outskirts of Rome. As her marriage breaks down, she is formidable in keeping things buoyant, but Andrea begins to reject her identity and gender, deciding to live like a boy. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- In one volatile summer in the 1970’s, Andrea and her family move into a stylish new apartment on the outskirts of Rome.
As her marriage breaks down, she is formidable in keeping things buoyant, but Andrea begins to reject her identity and gender, deciding to live like a boy.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Life's a Beach-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Life's a Beach
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Growing up with wealth and privilege, Pio has always lived a protected life. When his influential father passes away, he is assigned a new chauffeur, Amedeo. Amedeo is from the other side of the tracks and will set Pio on a new life path full of surprises. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Growing up with wealth and privilege, Pio has always lived a protected life.
When his influential father passes away, he is assigned a new chauffeur, Amedeo.
Amedeo is from the other side of the tracks and will set Pio on a new life path full of surprises.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Marcello Mio-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Marcello Mio
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Chiara is an actress but not as successful as her real-life parents, Marcello Mastroianni and Catherine Deneuve. With her life and career in disarray, Chiara decides to dress like her father and speak only Italian like him, in an impersonation so convincing that people begin to call her “Marcello.” ---

Italian & French with subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Chiara is an actress but not as successful as her real-life parents, Marcello Mastroianni and Catherine Deneuve.
With her life and career in disarray, Chiara decides to dress like her father and speak only Italian like him, in an impersonation so convincing that people begin to call her “Marcello.” --- Italian & French with subtitles

events.id: IFF - Maria Montessori-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Maria Montessori
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- A glamorous Parisian actress flees to Rome to protect her reputation and hide her daughter's learning disability. There, she meets Maria Montessori, a brilliant doctor who is developing a methodology for non-conventional children, but Maria has a secret of her own. ---

Italian and French
events.description:
Details --- A glamorous Parisian actress flees to Rome to protect her reputation and hide her daughter's learning disability.
There, she meets Maria Montessori, a brilliant doctor who is developing a methodology for non-conventional children, but Maria has a secret of her own.
--- Italian and French

events.id: IFF - My Killer Buddy-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - My Killer Buddy
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Denni is a 10-year-old boy with a mission to have his violent father killed by a super-assassin. Unfortunately, the guy he hires may look like a dangerous criminal, but really, he is only a petty criminal with no stomach or intention to kill anyone. ---

Italian, English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Denni is a 10-year-old boy with a mission to have his violent father killed by a super-assassin.
Unfortunately, the guy he hires may look like a dangerous criminal, but really, he is only a petty criminal with no stomach or intention to kill anyone.
--- Italian, English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Parthenope-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Parthenope
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Parthenope was the mythical Siren who founded Naples. We follow the beautiful woman who bears the name of her city on a decades-long journey searching for happiness during the long summers of her youth, falling in love and meeting the many memorable characters as she becomes a formidable woman. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Parthenope was the mythical Siren who founded Naples.
We follow the beautiful woman who bears the name of her city on a decades-long journey searching for happiness during the long summers of her youth, falling in love and meeting the many memorable characters as she becomes a formidable woman.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - The Beautiful Summer-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - The Beautiful Summer
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- In the youthful giddiness of the warmest season, nineteen-year-old Ginia moves to the big city of Turin. In this volatile pre-war period, she is drawn into a bohemian and free-spirited circle, finding herself unexpectedly captured by the charisma and beauty of Amelia. ---

Italian, English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- In the youthful giddiness of the warmest season, nineteen-year-old Ginia moves to the big city of Turin.
In this volatile pre-war period, she is drawn into a bohemian and free-spirited circle, finding herself unexpectedly captured by the charisma and beauty of Amelia.
--- Italian, English subtitles

events.id: IFF - The English Patient-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - The English Patient
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- In the late stages of WW2, a badly burned man, with no recollection of his own identity, is nursed by Nurse Hana in an abandoned Monastery in Tuscany. As he recovers, he slowly pieces his memories together, recollecting his past's epic, passionate, fateful love affair. ---

In English
events.description:
Details --- In the late stages of WW2, a badly burned man, with no recollection of his own identity, is nursed by Nurse Hana in an abandoned Monastery in Tuscany.
As he recovers, he slowly pieces his memories together, recollecting his past's epic, passionate, fateful love affair.
--- In English

events.id: IFF - The Talented Mr Ripley-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - The Talented Mr Ripley
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- When dilettante conman Ripley is mistaken for a Princeton graduate in 1950s New York, he goes along with the story and travels to Italy under false pretences. He becomes embroiled in the lives, passions and desires of Dickie and his fiancée Marge with deadly consequences. ---

In English
events.description:
Details --- When dilettante conman Ripley is mistaken for a Princeton graduate in 1950s New York, he goes along with the story and travels to Italy under false pretences.
He becomes embroiled in the lives, passions and desires of Dickie and his fiancée Marge with deadly consequences.
--- In English

events.id: IFF - The Treasure of his Youth-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - The Treasure of his Youth
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Di Paolo spent years photographing strikingly beautiful and iconic images of postwar and the glamour of the film scene of the 1950s and ‘60s. One day, he simply ceased to photograph, shutting away his negatives, and not even his own family was aware of his extraordinary legacy until this documentary. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Di Paolo spent years photographing strikingly beautiful and iconic images of postwar and the glamour of the film scene of the 1950s and ‘60s.
One day, he simply ceased to photograph, shutting away his negatives, and not even his own family was aware of his extraordinary legacy until this documentary.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Trust-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Trust
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Pietro, a revered teacher, and Teresa, his brilliant student, embark on an illicit and tempestuous affair. One night, while playing a game of trust and sharing, Pietro reveals a secret so shocking that it could destroy his life. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Pietro, a revered teacher, and Teresa, his brilliant student, embark on an illicit and tempestuous affair.
One night, while playing a game of trust and sharing, Pietro reveals a secret so shocking that it could destroy his life.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Vermiglio-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Vermiglio
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- When a handsome Sicilian deserter arrives at the remote village of Vermiglio high in the snowy Alps of Alto Adige in the last year of WWII, he disrupts the ancient balance of village life. Lucia, the eldest daughter of the Graziadeis family, falls for him, with consequences that will affect everyone in unexpected ways. ---
events.description:
Details --- When a handsome Sicilian deserter arrives at the remote village of Vermiglio high in the snowy Alps of Alto Adige in the last year of WWII, he disrupts the ancient balance of village life.
Lucia, the eldest daughter of the Graziadeis family, falls for him, with consequences that will affect everyone in unexpected ways.
---

events.id: IFF - War of the Nonni-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - War of the Nonni
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Gerri is an attentive and caring grandfather who diligently does everything he can to support his daughter and beloved grandchildren. When the fun-loving, ‘other’ grandfather arrives, breaking every rule and upsetting the peace, he unleashes a fierce feud. ---

Italian with English
events.description:
Details --- Gerri is an attentive and caring grandfather who diligently does everything he can to support his daughter and beloved grandchildren.
When the fun-loving, ‘other’ grandfather arrives, breaking every rule and upsetting the peace, he unleashes a fierce feud.
--- Italian with English

events.id: IFF - Welcome to the South-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Welcome to the South
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- A postal employee from northern Italy feigns a disability to get a transfer, but when he is caught, he is sent to a tiny village near Naples as punishment. Bringing all his prejudices, stereotypes, and fears about the South, he finds something different from what he was expecting. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- A postal employee from northern Italy feigns a disability to get a transfer, but when he is caught, he is sent to a tiny village near Naples as punishment.
Bringing all his prejudices, stereotypes, and fears about the South, he finds something different from what he was expecting.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Youth-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Youth
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Retired orchestra conductor Fred Ballinger is on vacation with his daughter Lena and his film director best friend Mick Boyle in a glamorous Swiss Alpine resort. When he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday, much to everyone’s surprise, he refuses. ---

In English
events.description:
Details --- Retired orchestra conductor Fred Ballinger is on vacation with his daughter Lena and his film director best friend Mick Boyle in a glamorous Swiss Alpine resort.
When he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday, much to everyone’s surprise, he refuses.
--- In English
